title: Foggy city street driving with multiple braking events.
caption: A red car drives slowly on a foggy city street with multiple braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (customWeather). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 3.5 m/s). There are 10 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The red car is driving slowly on a foggy city street with multiple braking events. The road is wet and there are other cars on the road. The traffic light is red and there is a pedestrian crossing the street.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because of the foggy conditions and the multiple braking events.
